title: Fail to install truffle in mac
body:
- [x] I've [opened a support ticket](https://trufflesuite.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue
Fail to install truffle in mac 

```

```

## Steps to Reproduce

`npm install -g truffle`

## Expected Behavior

install success

## Actual Results
it failed.

## Environment

* Operating System: 
* Ethereum client:
* Truffle version (`truffle version`):
* node version (`node --version`):
* npm version (`npm --version`): 
*
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16434756/152162840-8ee61e89-0737-47be-960e-ef19b8f72371.png)

Hi there. Thank you for opening the issue. 
Please help to downgrade node version to 14, and npm to 6? Node uses the odd and even release system, where even number releases are considered stable while odd numbers are not.
Let me know how this works out for you.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16434756/152271110-909f4a1d-7fce-47c5-918a-371a713a6213.png)

Ok, for node 14 and npm 6, it works fine. Thank you.

Just wonder why node 16 still doesn't work ? 16 is even ...
@xuyang1996 actually the problem is with npm versions 7 and 8 I believe. If you use npm version 6.x I think it should install fine. By default Node 16 uses npm version 8 I think.
Same issues for me, it work well after downgrading npm to v6.x.x but still have node v16.13.2 ! Thank you for this help !
Many thanks. I just realised that Node v 17 was causing an issue. Have now switched to V 16 and it's all fine!!
Looks like this is resolved, so I'm closing this issue. Please open a new issue if this is still happening.
try `brew install truffle` on macOS... good luck!
Was facing the same issue. Downgrading node and npm to version 14&6 worked respectively
Been struggling with this for AGES and this thread actually helped, made my whole life better
Downgrading to npm 6 helped 'npm install -g npm@6' node version 16, then 'npm install -g truffle', asked for an update after installation 'sudo npm install -g truffle'

Wow! you save my noon guys.. thanks for sharing. It is installed from [node 14.19.0](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/release/v14.19.0/); **truffle@5.5.19 at my console** without issues.

![Approved](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22258274/138466108-6b14c541-6a88-44c5-ba76-c64992ac1835.gif)
